## Refreshing Incremental Models


### Without Splits

1. In Rill developer via the UI, locally
2. In CLI, locally
3. In CLI, Rill Cloud


### With Splits

1. In Rill developer via the UI, locally
2. In CLI, locally
3. In CLI, Rill Cloud
